member.name: P:Newbe.ObjectVisitor.ApiStep.Share
member.summary: Indicate that share a logic as

example.code: e.g. 1 A --> B : C() there will be a action named C generated. A --> B : C() :shared D() there will be a action named C generated. It is not user custom function, and it invoke D in it`s block and function D is a user custom function
